miml.transformation.mimlTOml

Class GeometricTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • miml.transformation.mimlTOml.MIMLtoML
      • miml.transformation.mimlTOml.GeometricTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GeometricTransformation
extends MIMLtoML
    Class that performs a geometric transformation to convert a MIMLInstances class to MultiLabelInstances. Each Bag is transformed into a single Instance being the value of each attribute the geometric centor of its max and min values computed as (min_value+max_value)/2.
    Version:
    20210604
    Author:
    Ana I. Reyes Melero, Eva Gibaja, Amelia Zafra
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
